channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Kinds of power
item.description: There’s the James Bond villian sort of power, based on division, dominance and destruction. This is the short-term power of bullies, trauma and mobs. ...

item.title: To Unlock A Free ‘Smile 2’ Clip, Just Smile (For A Full Seven Minutes)
item.description: To watch the opening of the hit supernatural horror film before it starts streaming this month, just flash your best creepy smile at your webcam.

item.title: “I can’t go for that”

item.title: Mawari Raises $10.8 Million To Tokenize Spatial Streaming, A Peek At Google’s AI Agent Jarvis
item.description: Big tech was a big winner Tuesday night. There will be no regulation of AI, Crypto, Social Media, or Space. Tax cuts will be extended. Stocks soared.

item.title: The paradox of points
item.description: Points aren’t just for games. Points are how we keep score and decide what to do next. Pick your scorekeeping wisely. Too much focus on the score can ...

item.title: The problem with the movie version
item.description: There are lights, camera and action, but mostly there’s the unreality of making it fit. Happily ever after, a climax at just the right moment, perfect...

item.title: At all costs

item.title: Inside Canada’s $2.4 Billion Bet To Close The AI Adoption Gap
item.description: A recent report highlighted the "sluggish adoption” of Generative AI among Canadian businesses. It warns that if Canadian businesses do not accelerate...

item.title: Silicon Valley Defense Tech Can’t Wait For Trump To Get Started
item.description: With Elon Musk advising Trump, Silicon Valley’s defense leaders hope he will unlock the $800 billion Department of Defense budget for tech startups.
